body: Shark speakers prefer the company of vicious fish over other sahuagin.
name: Shark Speakers

sections.special_attacks: blood frenzy, combat style (two-handed weapon), favored enemy (elves +2)
sections.melee: mwk longspear +8 (1d8+4/×3), bite +2 (1d6+3) or 2 claws +7 (1d4+3), bite +7 (1d6+3)
sections.other_gear: mwk longspear, mwk underwater heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, hand of the mage, agate earring worth 25 gp, pearls (7, worth 100 gp each), 18 gp

sections.body: During Combat The deep racer regularly uses Pushing Assault.
sections.name: Tactics
Sahuagin Deep Racer
sections.skills: Handle Animal +5, Knowledge (geography) +9, Knowledge (nature) +9, Perception +9, Stealth +10, Survival +9, Swim +18
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Sahuagin/Example Sahuagin/Shark Speakers/Sahuagin Deep Racer

sections.special_attacks: blood frenzy, combat style (natural weapon), favored enemy (elves +2)
sections.other_gear: +1 studded leather, mwk underwater heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, cloak of resistance +1, bronze-and-agate pendant worth 50 gp, 9 gp
sections.feats: Aquatic Advantage*, Combat Reflexes, Endurance, Improved Natural Attack (claw), Toughness

sections.body:
Before Combat The shark sentry drinks its potion of greater magic fang, then reads scrolls of barkskin for itself and an ally.

Base Statistics Without greater magic fang and barkskin, the shark sentry's statistics are

AC 21, touch 12, flat-footed 19

Melee 2 claws +11 (1d6+5), bite +11 (1d4+5).
sections.name: Tactics

sections.special_qualities: favored terrain (water +2), hunter's bond (companions), track +2, wild empathy +5
sections.name: Sahuagin Shark Sentry
sections.skills: Climb +9, Handle Animal +10, Intimidate +10, Knowledge (nature) +10, Perception +10, Stealth +11, Survival +10, Swim +17
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Sahuagin/Example Sahuagin/Shark Speakers/Sahuagin Shark Sentry
sections.combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, potion of greater magic fang, scrolls of barkskin (2), +1 elf-bane bolts (4)
